# Colonial Marines Universe Rules
[color=#ff0000][bold]If you are unable to click any links, use the in-game guidebook version, in the escape menu.[/bold][/color]
CMU is a character focused roleplaying game. Combat exists to support the story, not the other way around.
[italic][color=#57b339][bold]Winning is never more important than roleplay or the story being created.[/bold][/color][/italic]
You are expected to fully embody this in your actions and words at all times. This is the intended experience and the standard CMU is built upon.
